About Me

I am from New Jersey, but I am currently based in Atlanta, GA, studying at the Georgia Institute of Technology. I'm a Computational Media major, specializing in people and interactive design.

I'm interested in UI/UX Design, UX research, and coding. Outside of the classroom, I enjoy exploring the city of Atlanta and going on a lot of tasty adventures.
